long_description: SaltStick Electrolyte salt capsules can help minimize muscle cramping, heat stress, and fatigue due to unbalanced electrolyte levels while your run, bike, swim and play sports. Each capsule contains 215mg of sodium, 63mg of potassium, 11mg of magnesium and 22mg of calcium; contains 100 IU of vitamin D to help the body absorb calcium. SaltStick capsules are formulated to resemble the electrolytes lost through sweating. Take 1 capsule every 30 - 60 min. to replace electrolytes lost during exercise. SaltStick Electrolyte salt capsules are gluten free and vegan; contain no sweeteners and zero calories. Package contains 3 SaltStick Electrolyte salt capsules. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: SaltStick Electrolyte salt capsules can help minimize muscle cramping, heat stress, and fatigue due to unbalanced electrolyte levels while your run, bike, swim and play sports.
